entry.title: CTV+CSFS: Can we reach consensus on a first step towards covenants?
entry.summary: This request emphasizes the desire to conduct tests on a network that is transparent and accessible to all parties involved, specifically through the use of the Mempool Space User Interface. The mention of "test net" suggests an interest in performing trial runs or experiments in a controlled environment before any deployment on the main network, ensuring that the process can be monitored and analyzed by anyone interested via Mempool Space. This approach not only fosters transparency but also encourages collaborative observation and analysis of the test results, allowing for a more inclusive and open review process.
